scripts.validate: pnpm format && pnpm lint && pnpm compile && pnpm test && pnpm licenseReport
scripts.docker:build: cd ../../ && ver && docker build -t yasdi-rest:%npm_package_version% -f projects/yasdi-rest/Dockerfile . || docker build -t yasdi-rest:$npm_package_version -f projects/yasdi-rest/Dockerfile .
scripts.docker:publish: cd ../../ && ver && docker buildx build --push --platform linux/arm/v7,linux/arm64/v8,linux/amd64 -t woifes/yasdi-rest:%npm_package_version% -f projects/yasdi-rest/Dockerfile . || docker buildx build --push --platform linux/arm/v7,linux/arm64/v8,linux/amd64 -t woifes/yasdi-rest:$npm_package_version -f projects/yasdi-rest/Dockerfile .
